input_text:
Job Title: ServiceNow Architect

Location: Austin, Texas Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Role: ServiceNow Architect (Need GCEAD, USC, GC)Location: Remote Duration: Fulltime 
Job DescriptionLead the design and implementation of ServiceNow solutions, ensuring alignment with industry best practices across multiple modules like ITSM, ITAM, ITOM, SPM, and Service Mapping.Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and understand complex business requirements and translate them into effective automated workflows.Provide subject expertise on the ServiceNow platform, serving as a product advocate within customer accounts.Lead project estimation, define project timelines, and contribute to project plans and milestones.Mentor and guide team members in design, development, and testing activities.Define architectural strategies and patterns commonly used within ServiceNow.Build clean, scalable, and reusable code while enforcing best practices in software engineering.Document business requirements to technical stories for development team.Leverage OOTB solution wherever possible using spoke or API.Ability to implement/design custom API when OOTB does not suit the requirement.Manage end-to-end upgrade and advise customers with the benefits of new features that can be implemented.Work closely with product owners to deliver high-quality solutions that meet user needs.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to enhance application development and deployment processes.Contribute to the design and implementation of new products and features while improving existing ones.Foster knowledge-sharing within the team and facilitate individual team member development.Conduct code reviews and provide coaching and mentorship to team members.Interact cross-functionally to coordinate efforts across the organization, voluntarily sharing information.
Best Regards,Suryateja| Sr. Technical Recruiter |Desk: 8483054306 | Email: suryateja@siriinfo.comSiri InfoSolutions Inc, 3 Ethel Rd, Suite # 302, Edison NJ 08817.LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/surya-teja-52b69721bReach me on WhatsApp: 87123-80789 
Disclaimer: We respect your online privacy. If you would like to be removed from our mailing list please reply with "Remove" in the subject and we will comply immediately. We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please let us know if you have more than one domain. The material in this e-mail is intended only for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed and may contain information that is confidential, privileged, and exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If you are not the intended recipient, be advised that the unauthorized use, disclosure, copying, distribution, or the taking of any action in reliance on this information is strictly prohibited. We are an equal opportunity employer with a diverse workforce. Note : Any resume submitted by Siriinfo is presented with the understanding that the candidate is being considered for your direct end-client (end-client is the company where the work will be performed). If there is any other company involved between the end-client and your company, please do not submit this resume without our written approval. If you submit the resume to another third party, Siriinfo reserves the right to work with the third party directly.
Proficient in AutoCAD and Revit

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: ServiceNow Architect
output_json.summary: Lead the design and implementation of ServiceNow solutions, ensuring alignment with industry best practices.
job_responsibilities: Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and understand complex business requirements and translate them into effective automated workflows.
Provide subject expertise on the ServiceNow platform.
Lead project estimation, define project timelines, and contribute to project plans and milestones.
Mentor and guide team members in design, development, and testing activities.
Define architectural strategies and patterns commonly used within ServiceNow.
Build clean, scalable, and reusable code while enforcing best practices in software engineering.
Document business requirements to technical stories for development team.
Leverage OOTB solution wherever possible using spoke or API.
Ability to implement/design custom API when OOTB does not suit the requirement.
Manage end-to-end upgrade and advise customers with the benefits of new features that can be implemented.
Work closely with product owners to deliver high-quality solutions that meet user needs.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to enhance application development and deployment processes.
Contribute to the design and implementation of new products and features while improving existing ones.
Foster knowledge-sharing within the team and facilitate individual team member development.
Conduct code reviews and provide coaching and mentorship to team members.
Interact cross-functionally to coordinate efforts across the organization, voluntarily sharing information.
output_json.company_information: Siri InfoSolutions Inc, 3 Ethel Rd, Suite # 302, Edison NJ 08817
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: We are an equal opportunity employer with a diverse workforce.
